item.description:
The self described "regional standard bearer of great food,great wine, and great service." Meritage can't be beat when it comes to an upscale yet relaxed atmosphere. Enjoy one of the many select wines for which the Meritage name is famous. or tuck into exceptional dishes such as the grilled swordfish with tropical fruit salsa or 14 oz pork loin chop with apple-pear chutney. Sounds good doesn't it , hope to see you there!

Here is the website:
http://www.meritageri...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess where the RI Dine out group is seated

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: The Meritage
